name: Operating System

related.name: Screen Settings
related.preview: Modern displays allow for a multitude of calibration options, from your screens resolution, to the number of colors it will render. The calibration of these can effect your browsing experience.

related.name: Reduced Motion
related.preview: Some operating systems allow users to enable reduced motion, which disables dramatic movements throughout the systems interface. Recently web browsers have been adding support for this feature if

text:
An operating system (OS) is system software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs.

Check your OS version

Mac

  • Click the Apple Icon in the top left of your screen
  • Click About this Mac
  • Within the overview screen your macOS and version are shown

Update your OS

Mac

  • Click the Apple Icon in the top left of your screen
  • Click About this Mac
  • Click the Software Update... button to check if updates are available
